intro.subtitle: Certified Professionals
intro.description: Say goodbye to the hassle and high costs of maintaining an internal finance team. Let us handle it with ease and deliver better results, so you can focus on growing your business!

about.title: WE SERVE CLIENTS FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD
about.aboutCEO: With over a decade of experience, Finansist has evolved from a local accounting firm to a globally recognized. Serving clients across the world, specializing in international regulations. We leverage cutting-edge technology to deliver seamless bookkeeping and tax preparation services no matter where you are. Based in Indonesia, our strategic location allows us to offer cost-effective solutions that consistently exceed expectations, providing exceptional value compared to other consultant.

tagsLine.part0: We Make You Focus On Developing Your Business

description.subtitle: Providing services that is meets to your needs
description.description: We believe accounting is a critical foundation for business success, but it should never become a burden. Please share with us the overview of your company’s current situation, so that we can provide a fair proposal and a perfect solution for you.

description.subtitle: Saving your hiring costs with more benefits
description.description: Our internationally certified professionals will precisely handle your needs for seamless, cost-effective results and no drama. Stop paying salaries, allowances, bonuses, training costs, monitoring software, and other expenses for each person.

description.subtitle: Adapt to your capabilities
description.description: With a flexible approach, we deliver maximum value without excessive costs. Let’s work together to create efficient and affordable accounting solutions to support your business growth.

customerType.description: We serve various industries, supported by a team of internationally certified experts and have in-depth experience in the specific needs of each sector. With a flexible approach, Finansist is ready to help your business grow based on your goals and business conditions.

title.part2: against the hassles of having employees

items.title: Cost Efficiency
items.description: Hiring a large number of employees comes with significant expenses, including salaries, benefits, insurance, training, and workplace infrastructure. These costs can reduce financial efficiency, especially for businesses aiming to growing forward and cost-effective.

contentModal.description1: Having an in-house team means committing to fixed salaries, benefits, and other ongoing employee costs.
contentModal.description2: With us, you only pay per project or service, allowing you to allocate more of your budget toward growing your business.

items.title: Powered by Professionals
items.description: Not all employees possess the specialized skills your business may require. Recruiting high-level talent can be expensive and time-consuming, often leaving companies with teams that may lack the necessary competence to tackle complex or evolving challenges.

contentModal.description1: When your company requires highly specialized financial expertise (mergers and acquisitions, international taxation, or advanced investment analysis) your in-house team may lack the necessary depth of knowledge.
contentModal.description2: Finansist offers internationally certified expertise across a wide range of fields, giving your business access to a complete and capable team.

items.title: High Flexibility
items.description: In-house teams are often limited by their size, making it difficult to handle multiple projects simultaneously. This can lead to delays, lowered performance, and challenges in meeting evolving business demands.

contentModal.description1: In-house teams often face limitations in bandwidth, making it difficult to manage multiple priorities or respond quickly to unexpected demands.
contentModal.description2: Finanasist offer the flexibility to scale resources up or down as needed, allowing your business to stay agile and responsive without being constrained by internal capacity.

items.title: Reduced Managerial Burden
items.description: Managing more employees means more time spent on supervision, performance reviews, internal communication, and conflict resolution. This can divert leadership’s attention away from strategic growth and innovation.

contentModal.description1: Building an in-house finance team also requires ongoing recruitment and training costs to ensure the team stays up to date with the latest skills and knowledge.
contentModal.description2: You can access a complete set of resources at a significantly lower cost, without the hassle of recruiting and training.

items.title: Always Adapt to New Regulation
items.description: In-house teams often struggle to keep up with evolving regulations and financial trends as their focus is primarily on day-to-day operations and they are not typically tasked with monitoring regulatory developments.

contentModal.description1: In-house teams may find it challenging to stay up to date with the constantly evolving regulations and trends in finance, business, and taxation.
contentModal.description2: Our experienced team bring diverse industry insights, enabling your business to stay connected, agile, and compliant with the latest regulatory changes.

items.title: Accounting & Bookkeeping
benefits: Preparation of financial statements (e.g., balance sheet, income statement, cash flow statement)
Chart of accounts setup and maintenance
benefitsDetails: Preparation of financial statements (e.g., balance sheet, income statement, cash flow statement)
Chart of accounts setup and maintenance
Bank, credit card, and loan reconciliation

details.overview: Our services focus on delivering end-to-end financial management solutions that encompass accurate preparation of financial statements, efficient bookkeeping, and cash flow optimization. We streamline accounting processes with robust general ledger maintenance, reconciliation, and expense tracking. Through custom reporting, variance analysis, and tailored business insights, we enable informed decision-making. Additionally, we ensure seamless accounts payable, receivable, and payroll management, alongside effective budgeting and forecasting to support strategic growth and financial stability.
extendedServices: Operational Efficiency and Cash Flow Optimization

items.title: Tax Report and Planning
benefits: Income tax preparation and filing (corporate, individual, and partnership)
Indonesian national taxes and local tax authority representation
benefitsDetails: Income tax preparation and filing (corporate, individual, and partnership)
Indonesian national taxes and local tax authority representation
Assistance with VAT, international tax, and fiscal adjustmen

details.overview: Our tax services provide comprehensive solutions to meet all your tax compliance and planning needs. We ensure accurate preparation and filing of income tax returns for individuals, corporations, and partnerships, alongside full compliance with VAT/GST, sales tax, and withholding tax regulations. Our strategic tax planning and advisory services are designed to minimize liabilities, maximize savings, and address complex tax issues like international tax and fiscal adjustments. We also offer professional representation with tax authorities and assist with tax audits, ensuring smooth and compliant operations. Customized solutions are tailored to your business needs, offering insights into tax credits, deductions, and strategies for optimizing financial outcomes.
extendedServices: Customized Solutions for Complex Tax Needs

items.title: CFO Package | Accounting, Finance, and Tax Support
benefits: Financial dashboard including overview profit and loss summaries, cash balances, accounts receivable and payable, number of employees, and other essential financial indicators.
benefitsDetails: Financial dashboard including overview profit and loss summaries, cash balances, accounts receivable and payable, number of employees, and other essential financial indicators.
Advising on funding, investments, and cost efficiency.
Guiding financial strategy aligned with business goals.

details.overview: Our CFO services provide the strategic financial expertise your business needs without the cost of a full-time executive. Finansist provide a comprehensive financial dashboard that gives you a real-time overview of your business performance. The overview includes key metrics such as profit and loss summaries, cash balances, accounts receivable and payable, number of employees, and other essential financial indicators. With this clear and customized output, you can monitor your business health at a glance and make faster, data-driven decisions. From cash flow and budgeting to financial forecasting and decision support, we help you build a stronger financial foundation and drive smarter growth.
extendedServices: A complete strategic financial management package that lets you focus on other areas such as operations and marketing.
Monitoring cash flow, assets, inventory, and taxation to ensure your business runs healthily, grows sustainably, and stays compliant with standards.
Our services include consultations, monthly business analysis, and identifying opportunities for fraud prevention and improvement.

items.title: Audit, Assurance, and Risk Management Services
benefits: Due diligence for mergers and acquisitions
benefitsDetails: Due diligence for mergers and acquisitions

details.overview: Our audit services provide a thorough examination of your financial transparency, fraud risks, abuse of authority, asset valuation, cash flow tracking, risk management, and operational efficiency. We ensure your financial reports are accurate, identify potential discrepancies, and verify your compliance with regulations. By detecting and mitigating financial risks early, we help keep your business secure, well-controlled, and capable of adapting to market challenges with confidence.

items.title: Payroll and Employee Benefits Management Services
benefits: Compliance and Calculation of Employee Withholding Tax Article 21
Employee benefits administration/ or BPJS Kesehatan (Indonesia) and other additional
benefitsDetails: Payroll tax compliance and reporting/ Reporting of Employee PPh 21 (Indonesia)
Employee benefits administration/ or BPJS Kesehatan (Indonesia) and other additional
Managing retirement plans and superannuation/ or BPJS Ketenagakerjaan (Indonesia)

details.overview: Our payroll and employee benefits services ensure efficient and compliant management of all aspects of employee compensation and welfare. We handle accurate payroll calculation and processing, generating payslips and payment summaries for transparency. Our services include ensuring full tax compliance, including Reporting of Employee PPh 21 in Indonesia, and managing employee tax deductions to prevent issues with tax authorities. We also manage employee benefits, including health coverage (BPJS Kesehatan) and retirement plans (BPJS Ketenagakerjaan), ensuring full compliance with local regulations. Additionally, we oversee retirement and superannuation plans, providing employees with long-term financial security while ensuring timely and correct contributions. These services are designed to support both employers and employees, ensuring smooth payroll operations and employee satisfaction.

items.title: SET UP PMA service
benefits: Approval from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia
Username and Password for PT PMA application access
Approval of Conformity of Land Use Activities with Spatial Planning
benefitsDetails: Approval from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia
Username and Password for PT PMA application access
Approval of Conformity of Land Use Activities with Spatial Planning

details.overview: Setting up a PT PMA, or Foreign Investment Limited Liability Company, in Indonesia requires thorough understanding of applicable regulations and legal procedures. We are here to assist you through every step of the establishment process smoothly and without obstacles. Our services include guidance from drafting the deed of establishment, obtaining official permits, to securing all essential documents such as Tax Identification Number (NPWP), Business Identification Number (NIB), and approvals from relevant authorities. We also ensure your company complies with land use regulations according to spatial planning. Additionally, we assist in opening bank accounts to support your company’s financial operations. With our experience and extensive network, we guarantee your PT PMA establishment is fast, accurate, and fully compliant with the latest Indonesian regulations.

items.title: Specialized Reporting and Costume Made Services
benefits: Registration NPWP, EFIN, Electronic Sertificate, Coretax Account, NPWPD, etc
BPJS Healthcare and Employment Enrollment & Deregistration
benefitsDetails: Registration NPWP, EFIN, Electronic Sertificate, Coretax Account, NPWPD, etc
BPJS Healthcare and Employment Enrollment & Deregistration
Industry-specific accounting (e.g., for construction, e-commerce, manufacture, or others)
Additional reports customized to your preferences

details.overview: Finansist's services go beyond standard financial reporting. We provide tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of your business, including BPJS administration, comprehensive tax services from NPWP registration to tax audit assistance, as well as LKPM reporting and OSS administration. No need to worry if financial reports seem difficult to understand. With Finansist, you will receive financial reports customized to reflect the nature of your business, whether in e commerce, construction, manufacturing, hospitality, or other industries, making them more relevant, easier to read, and more useful for decision making.
extendedServices: BPJ, tax, OSS, LKPM administration services
Reports customized to your business needs and preferences

items.title: Accounting Software Implementation and Support Services
benefits: Accounting software setup (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero, Accurate, etc.)
Checking the validity of the software currently in use
benefitsDetails: Accounting software setup (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero, Accurate, etc.)
Checking the validity of the software currently in use

details.overview: Our accounting software and system implementation services are designed to enhance your financial management with modern, efficient solutions. We begin with accounting software setup, ensuring platforms like QuickBooks and Xero are configured to suit your business needs, ensuring accurate financial tracking. We offer comprehensive software training and ongoing support, empowering your team to maximize the software's capabilities and resolve any technical issues promptly. Our services also include cloud-based accounting system implementation, allowing your business to benefit from flexible, real-time access to financial data while maintaining security. Finally, we handle data migration and integration, ensuring a smooth transition from your previous systems to the new software without data loss, while integrating multiple financial tools to streamline your operations. These services help businesses improve their accounting processes, enhance efficiency, and reduce manual errors.

items.title: Business Partner
items.description: Finansist International opens opportunities to cooperation in order to develop better services. For those of you who interested to grow with us, feel free to contact us!

questions.question: What is Finansist?
questions.answer: Finansist International is an accounting and tax reporting service firm with over 10 years of experience in the industry, serving clients from Indonesia and around the world. We offer a wide range of professional services, including bookkeeping, tax compliance, financial reporting, cloud-based financial system implementation, and comprehensive financial packages that cover all aspects of your company’s financial management, so you can focus on operations and business growth. Backed by a team of internationally certified professionals, Finansist is committed to helping you manage your business finances efficiently and in full compliance with current regulations.

questions.question: What are the benefits of using Finansist's services?
questions.answer: With Finansist, managing your finances becomes easier, more accurate, and fully compliant, so you can focus on growing your business with confidence. Our services are built on a reliable cloud system that ensures data security and accessibility, giving you peace of mind every step of the way. Designed to be flexible and cost-effective, our solutions support businesses and professionals in optimizing their financial management. We’re here for you 24/7, wherever you are in the world. Enjoy customized financial reports, seamless online meetings, secure cloud-based document storage, and the support of a certified team experienced in leading accounting software.

questions.question: How do I get started with Finansist's services?
questions.answer: Visit finansistinternational.com and contact our team via WhatsApp or email. We will guide you through the next steps to start using our services. For any questions beyond the FAQ, feel free to reach out for additional information and support.

questions.question: How can Finansist guarantee the security of customer data?
questions.answer: Customer data security is guaranteed through advanced and trusted cloud-based systems designed to prevent unauthorized access, maintain confidentiality, and provide secure real-time access. Finansist also enforces strict security protocols in line with industry standards to protect client data integrity and privacy.

questions.question: Is Finansist only for companies in Indonesia?
questions.answer: No. We also offer bookkeeping, tax, and CFO service packages for businesses internationally across the globe. Guided by our international standards, we provide 24/7 global services that can follow and adapt to your local time zone wherever you are.
